sentences.english: The catcher was dinged on the head by a wild throw.
sentences.chinese: 那个凶猛的投球打在接手的头上。

sentences.english: Gorillas are very fierce-looking, with broad shoulders, powerful arms, and pointed teeth.
sentences.chinese: 狒狒样子凶猛，肩膀宽阔，手臂很长，牙齿尖锐。

sentences.english: When riled , the Druids of the Claw display ferocious power and stamina.
sentences.chinese: 当被激怒时，利爪德鲁依便展现出凶猛的力量和耐力。

sentences.english: The oncoming force of the typhoon was ferocious.
You can just imagine how fierce the wild animals can be.
sentences.chinese: 你可以想象一下野生动物是多么的凶猛。

sentences.english: Courageous, bold, almost to the point of ferocity, they were untiring and resistant to pain.
sentences.chinese: 勇敢，大胆，几乎到了凶猛点，他们不知疲倦和耐痛。

sentences.english: Rip currents are so strong that they can carry swimmers away from shore before they know what's happening.
sentences.chinese: 强流来势凶猛，会在不知不觉问把游泳者卷走。

sentences.english: The fire builds, devouring everything in its path.
sentences.chinese: 凶猛的大火将沿途上的一切都吞噬。

sentences.english: The speed and ferocity of the Lehman Brothers crisis brought the world to the brink of a meltdown.
sentences.chinese: 雷曼兄弟危机的快速和凶猛将世界带到了崩溃的边缘。

sentences.english: The child turned and ran in fright from the fierce-looking dog.
sentences.chinese: 看到那条样子凶猛的狗，那个孩子转过身害怕地跑了。

sentences.english: The mob fell on the killers and clubbed them to death.
sentences.chinese: 乱民凶猛地攻击杀人者，把他们乱棍打死了。

sentences.english: The authorities probably regard the union leaders as rogue elephants.
sentences.chinese: 当局也许视工会的领导人如离群的凶猛野象。

sentences.english: The grippe hit unusually severely that year .
sentences.chinese: 流行性感冒来得异常凶猛。

sentences.english: Following the trail with the sureness of a bloodhound, came the general.
sentences.chinese: 就象尾随追踪的凶猛猎狗那么准确，将军跟了上来。

sentences.english: "It was taught by a fungal geneticist, " he says.
sentences.chinese: “教课的是一位凶猛的遗传学家”，他说。

sentences.english: As docile as she seems today, that lioness was once a ferocious beast.
sentences.chinese: 那母狮子原是只凶猛的野兽，今天牠却这般温顺。

definition: variant of 兇惡|凶恶, fierce/ferocious/fiendish/frightening
